casebody.data:
James GUILBEAU, et al.
v.
LIBERTY MUTUAL INS. CO., et al. Keith Antoine
v.
Liberty Mutual Ins. Co., et al. Clyde Guillory
v.
Liberty Mutual Ins. Co., et al. No. 19-CC-0579 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 3, 2019 ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE TWENTY SEVENTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT, PARISH OF ST. LANDRY Writ denied. WEIMER, J., would grant.

CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons.

CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons:

For the reasons stated by Judge Pickett in his dissent, I would grant the defendant's writ application, reverse the lower courts' rulings and reinstate the defendant's right to a jury trial in this case.
